## Assignments

```{r}
f  <- list.files("hw", pattern='*.Rmd')
f <- f[!grepl("solutions", f )]
hw <- data.frame(filenames = paste0('hw/', f ))

out.hw <- hw %>% mutate(name = gsub("hw/|.Rmd",  "", filenames), 
                        link = sprintf("[%s](%s)",name, filenames))

```

```{r}
kable(t(out.hw$link), align='c') %>% 
  column_spec (1:4,border_left = T, border_right = T) %>%
  kable_classic(full_width = F, html_font = "Courier New", font_size = 25, position = "left")
```


```{r}
note.files <- list.files("notes", pattern='*.html')
note.path  <- paste0("notes/", note.files)
note.names <- gsub(".html",  "", note.files)
note.rmd.files <- list.files("notes", pattern='notes')

notes <- data.frame(`Lesson Name` = note.names, 
                    HTML = sprintf("[HTML](%s)", note.path), 
                    PDF  = sprintf("[PDF](%s)", gsub(".html", ".pdf", note.path)), 
                    idx  = str_extract(note.names, "\\d{2}"))

helper.files <- data.frame(note.rmd.files = list.files("notes", pattern='notes'), 
                           idx = str_extract(note.rmd.files, "\\d{2}"), 
                           `Helper Files` = sprintf("[RMD](%s)", note.rmd.files)
                           )
display <- full_join(notes, helper.files) %>% 
              select(-idx, -note.rmd.files) %>%
              rename(`Lesson Name` = Lesson.Name, `Helper File` = Helper.Files)
```

<br>

## Lecture notes
Notes and slides are available in both HTML and PDF formats. For some lessons R Markdown "fill in the blank" helper notes are also available. 
To download RMD files, right click and "save as". Do not open in a browser then save. 


```{r}
kable(display, align='lccc') %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = F, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), 
                html_font = "Courier New", font_size = 15, position = "left")
```
